title: Good Morning GD!!!
body:
{{champion:267}} I think today will be a wonderful day on the rift for you guys :)

It is not such a wonderful day at work for me! ;)

What champions are you planning on playing today?

When I get home I think Im going to play  some more goatlegbananalady!
